metadata.title: Avoiding 5/4-Powers on the Alphabet of Nonnegative Integers (Extended Abstract)

body_text.text: We use Mathematica to carry out several computations required in the proofs.
If a word is pre-5/4-power-free, then it is also 5/4-power-free.

BIBREF0.title: Avoiding squares and overlaps over the natural numbers
